programme.title: Adam-12
programme.sub-title: Log 152 -- A Dead Cop Can't Help Anyone
programme.desc: Malloy tries to shield an impressionable Reed from Officer Ed Wells, a shoot-first-ask-questions-later style officer. Wells' reckless philosophy endangers his own safety when he responds to a sniper, forcing them to come to his rescue.

programme.title: Adam-12
programme.sub-title: Log 12: He – He Was Trying To Kill Me
programme.desc: "Malloy and Reed investigate a case of child neglect."

programme.title: The A-Team
programme.desc: "Gen. Fullbright searches for his Amerasian daughter in Vietnam."

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: With the possibility of contaminated morphine, the doctors at the 4077th administer placebos to the patients, which seems to work. Meanwhile, a new soldier, "Boots" Miller, is released on a Section Eight.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: Hawkeye undergoes a drastic change when he becomes temporary commander of the 4077th, and learns about the tedious bureaucracy and accompanying headaches that Colonel Potter deals with daily.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Barney tries to help out his visiting cousin, Virgil. When Virgil makes one too many mistakes, Barney rails against him and storms out. Leave it to Andy to put things right.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Otis has been writing letters to his brother and sister-in-law for some time on courthouse stationary. Because of this, they have come to believe that he is a deputy, something they expect to see on their upcoming visit.

programme.title: Gomer Pyle, U.S.M.C.
programme.desc: Gomer inadvertently reveals the position of his platoon to the "enemy" during camp maneuvers.

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: Oliver has collected soil samples from his farm for the university to analyze. When the samples are accidentally spilled, Oliver's mother siezes the opportunity to get her son off the farm; she mixed the dirt with products from her cosmetics bag.

programme.title: Hogan's Heroes
programme.desc: Hogan plans to steal the picture that the Gestapo is using to blackmailing Klink.

programme.title: Hogan's Heroes
programme.desc: Hogan must prevent the Germans from getting ahold of a secret device that was aboard a plane shot down near camp.

programme.title: Carol Burnett and Friends
programme.desc: In Kitchen Commercials, Carol and the gang parody classic kitchen commercials. Then, in Fire At Will, Private Tim can't detonate the cannon successfully. Finally, in The Comic, Carol cheers up her comedian husband by heckling him.

programme.title: Perry Mason
programme.sub-title: The Case Of The Duplicate Case
programme.desc: After his cheating wife's body is recovered from the burned-out department store where she worked, a man finds $72,000 in his briefcase.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A man finds himself in a town strangely devoid of people. What's more, he can't recall his own identity.

programme.title: Alfred Hitchcock Presents
programme.desc: Immature Elliott Gray challenges a much older gentleman for the hand of Enid Patterson.

programme.title: Alfred Hitchcock Presents
programme.desc: After spending six years in prison for a robbery he didn't commit, a man decides to get even.

programme.title: Mannix
programme.desc: A former priest who heard a murder confession hires Mannix to find the killer.

programme.title: Cannon
programme.desc: Gordon Bell gets involved in a fight. When his opponent dies, Gordon is arrested and charged with murder. Cannon has to bring the truth to light . The corpulent detective soon discovers that Gordon is only a pawn in a devilish scheme.

programme.title: Barnaby Jones
programme.desc: Due to circumstantial evidence, Betty's old flame is a prime suspect in a restaurant tycoon's death.

programme.title: Highway Patrol
programme.desc: A grudge leads to the accidental death of a Highway Patrol officer.

programme.title: Dragnet
programme.desc: Citizens are full of praise for Officer Gideon C. Dengle, wanting to bestow him with awards, honors and home-baked cookies. There's only one problem: there's no such officer in the LAPD.

programme.title: Dragnet
programme.desc: A teenage runaway, intent on becoming a star, has instead wound up in pornographic films. Acting on behalf of the girl's aunt, Friday and Gannon try to find the young "starlet."

programme.title: My Three Sons
programme.desc: When the triplets come home from the hospital, Robbie finds that he is totally unprepared for the attention the infants attract.

programme.title: Toon In With Me
programme.desc: "Bill and Toony celebrate another Fantastic Friday with cartoons premiering on "Toon In With Me", including Tom and Jerry, Popeye and Woody Woodpecker."

programme.title: Leave It to Beaver
programme.desc: June runs across Beaver's old electric trains while cleaning and because he hasn't played with them in years, finds someone who will take them, with Beaver's consent. However, Beaver quickly re-discovers the fun of playing with the trains and wants to withdraw from the arrangement, even though the new owners-to-be are expecting them.

programme.title: Leave It to Beaver
programme.desc: Richard has just gotten, as Beaver describes it, a "keen" new jacket and this prompts Beaver to ask his parents for one exactly like it. June and Ward are hesitant after learning the price but decide to give in. However, when Richard loses his jacket, he coerces Beaver into a plot to trick his parents.

programme.title: Perry Mason
programme.sub-title: The Case Of The Calendar Girl
programme.desc: A building contractor is charged with the murder of a wealthy political Mr. fix-it.

programme.title: Matlock
programme.desc: When Matlock's nephew, Irwin, is charged with murder, his investigation leads to a high-tech computer firm.

programme.title: In the Heat of the Night
programme.desc: Gillespie's old flame returns to Sparta to settle some business matters and see Bill. When she is murdered he travels to Gulfport and meets his daughter Lana for the first time.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Erin adopts a wild animal while John Boy gets a life lesson with a new job

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: Doc treats a woman and her son for scurvy.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: When residents of Tin Bucket claim the Cartwrights and Candy are dealing in stolen cattle hides, Ben is determined to discover who is actually responsible for the hide thefts.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas tries to dissuade a latter-day knight from rushing into battle.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Able Lincoln's claim that he's the Great Emancipator himself amuses everyone except Matt Yorty.

programme.title: Wagon Train
programme.desc: "When the Levy family joins the wagon train, the tranquility becomes less so as the fathers compete in checkers, young sons fight, and son and daughter fall in love. Lastly, a settler who tries to shake down the train to cross his property."

programme.title: Adam-12
programme.sub-title: Log 172 -- Boy...the Things You Do For The Job
programme.desc: After Malloy gives a gorgeous wealthy blonde a traffic ticket, she stalks him, affecting him and the police force. Although uninterested in her, Malloy is forced to "take one" for the job.

programme.title: Adam-12
programme.sub-title: Log 92 -- Tell Him He Pushed Back A Little Too Hard
programme.desc: Malloy and Reed respond to repeated calls about an argument between two men and their wives over a boat they co-own. The feud escalates and ends with a fatal conclusion.

programme.title: The A-Team
programme.desc: "A powerful and mysterious government official (Robert Vaughn) blackmails Hannibal (George Peppard) and his cohorts into cooperating with him on a hostage-freeing mission in Mexico."

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: Hawkeye becomes so disgusted with the stalled Panmunjon peace talks that he impulsively takes matters into his own hands, and goes to the meetings to lend a hand.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: Colonel Potter meets a female soldier of the same age and interests as himself named Lil. The others in the camp think that he might be cheating on Mildred, even though his friendship with Lil is completely platonic. Meanwhile, Hawkeye tries to find out what B.J.'s initials stand for. As it turns out, he was named after his parents, Bea and Jay Hunnicutt.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: While walking through the woods, Opie meets Mr. McBeevee, a man who, Opie claims, "lives in the trees" and "jingles when he walks." Andy eventually learns that Opie's new friend works for the telephone company.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Andy has begun seeing Peggy McMillan and he discovers she is from a wealthy family. The differences in their upbringings and education unsettle Andy, and he begins to doubt the ability of the relationship to endure.

programme.title: Gomer Pyle, U.S.M.C.
programme.desc: Gomer overhears a conversation about Bunny's sick cat and jumps to the conclusion that it's Sgt. Carter who is critically ill.

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.sub-title: You Can't Plug In A 2 With A 6
programme.desc: It's planting time in Hooterville and Oliver is shocked that the locals make their crop choices based on aches and pains. Back on the farm, Oliver assigns every electrical device a number from one to seven in an effort to keep their creaky generator from blowing. All gadgets up to a total of seven can be plugged in at the same time, but Lisa can't quite grasp the concept.

programme.title: Hogan's Heroes
programme.desc: Hogan must get a defecting field marshal to England, whom Hochstetter has followed to Stalag 13.

programme.title: Hogan's Heroes
programme.desc: Hogan gets the Germans to look for an allied agent by planting an opened parachute in camp. This gives him the opportunity to get at the briefcase that was handcuffed to a courier.

programme.title: Carol Burnett and Friends
programme.desc: In Working at Marriage, Carol and Tim have their weekly gripe promptly at 8am. Then, in Natural Velvet, Carol and the gang parody "National Velvet", with Carol playing the horse.

programme.title: Perry Mason
programme.sub-title: The Case Of The Grinning Gorilla
programme.desc: A scientist involved in a lawsuit with his former housekeeper is found stabbed to death, and the housekeeper—though cornered by a loose gorilla—is present when the corpse is discovered.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A street salesman cleverly eludes Death. But if he lives, a little girl must die in his place.

programme.title: Alfred Hitchcock Presents
programme.desc: After a man turns to prayer, he starts to win at the races.

programme.title: Alfred Hitchcock Presents
programme.desc: In prison for jaywalking, a salesman finds himself locked in a cell with an accused murderer.

programme.title: Mannix
programme.desc: An attorney hires Mannix to discover who's trying to kill his client, a prominent surgeon.

programme.title: Cannon
programme.desc: Cannon investigates a kidnapping case. The lawyer David Rackham has been abducted. Because he is diabetic and needs a certain drug, Cannon questions the pharmacists of the surroundings.

programme.title: Barnaby Jones
programme.desc: While investigation a fatal automobile accident, Barnaby uncovers a complex scheme to defraud a bank.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: Steve Elliott hurriedly takes off on a crop-dusting job, not knowing he underbid for the assignment by $1800.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: Uncle Joe takes over the Shady Rest and is almost run out of town for allegedly tossing out an old man for not paying rent.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Elly comes running to Granny with distressing news, sickness! Fairchild, Elly’s bear, is sick. Meanwhile, at the bank, Miss Jane has a visitor, Lieutenant Mark Templeton of the US Navy. He is Matthew Templeton’s brother. Drysdale kicks the two out, and Jane takes Mark to the Clampetts to meet the beautiful Elly. At this time, Granny made medicine for Elly May’s bear, but Jethro ate it. Elly tries to remake it, but fails, and ends up looking a mess.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Just as the Clampetts are preparing to go home to the hills, Jethro receives a draft notice from the President. The women go ahead without them, and Jethro gets a few uniforms from the movie studio, one of a Prussian Field Marshall and one for General Patton. Jethro buys a tank and hopes for a crew, employing Drysdale and outfitting him with a Prussian Field Marshall uniform.

programme.title: Popeye and Pink Panther's Party
programme.sub-title: Be Kind To “aminals”, Popeye The Sailor Meets Ali Baba’s Forty Thieves, Lucky Pink, Sacre Bleu Cross, Flying Feet, Pinkadilly Circus
programme.desc: "Popeye and Olive see Bluto driving a wagon hitting his weak-looking horse because he cannot pull the wagon., Coast guardsman Popeye is ordered to stop Ali Baba and his 40 thieves from robbing desert villages., The Pink Panther finds a lucky horseshoe which causes back luck for a bank robber., On the trail of a dangerous criminal, Sgt. Deux-Deux finds that his lucky rabbit's foot has become a magnet for disaster., Roland is packing his bags as he is leaving for college. He gets to the train station too late so he decides to run all the way there. When he arrives he sees that they are going to have a big race and he decides to enter. Rattfink is also in the race and spends more time trying to slow up Roland than running the race, The Pink Panther tries to help a man who pulled a thorn out of his paw -- whether the man wants him to or not!"

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.sub-title: Baby Puss, Droopy's Double Trouble, Discontented Canary, Sufferin' Cats, Dance Of The Weed, Puttin' On The Dog
programme.desc: "A little girl makes Tom her baby cat and Jerry with some alley cats taunt the unfortunate feline., Droopy and his strong identical twin cause Spike all kinds of trouble when he needs a place to stay., Unhappy with his life in a cage, a canary escapes but soon finds that life in the wild isn’t as great as he thought it would be., Jerry is a prize to be won between Tom and an alley cat because neither feline wants to share him., A male weed tries to court a female flower by dancing with her but he is a little too clumsy., Tom chases Jerry right into a dog pound, so he puts on a dog disguise."

programme.title: Bugs Bunny and Friends
programme.sub-title: Ballot Box Bunny, Double Chaser, Bowery Bugs, The Bear's Tale, The Old Grey Hare, Lost And Foundling
programme.desc: "Bugs runs against Yosemite Sam in this political comic farce. Bugs opting for "speak softly and carry a big stick" and Sam opting for "speak louder and carry a bigger stick." , A cat chasing a mouse is chased by a bulldog. , Bugs recounts a story of how he tricked a man so much so that he jumped off a bridge. , An unorthodox story about Goldilocks and the three bears. , Elmer Fudd asks God when he will finally be able to catch Bugs. , An egg rolls into Sniffles house and when it hatches he adopts the bird thinking it is a chicken. "

programme.title: Maverick
programme.desc: Bret falls for the tempting trickery of pretty woman Abigail Johnson and finds himself helplessly involved in a swindle.

programme.title: Wagon Train
programme.desc: "Indians kidnap an elderly lady on the train. They will return her when the train takes the Chief's son to the doctor and cure him. However, some on the train don't want to help. The task becomes harder when they learn what the illness is."

programme.title: The Big Valley
programme.desc: Audra wants to flirt with Evan Miles, a childhood friend back from the east. Little does she know that he suffers from a dangerous emotional instability.

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: A woman tries to raise her son in Dodge after her husband is killed in a gunfight.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: A young brat and distant relative of the Cartwrights annoys everyone when he comes for a visit to the Ponderosa.

programme.title: Rawhide
programme.desc: Mace and Gorman the new drovers have more than cows on thier minds. Mace shows Favor a reward poster for $10,000 for a white girl captured by the Apaches. Rowdy visits the grave of his sister killed by indians, and then refuses to sell 12 head to Yuma, the Apache chief.

programme.title: Have Gun, Will Travel
programme.desc: An ex-con needs help: someone's trying to murder him.

programme.title: Wanted Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Sarah Lawton's identification led to killer Clem Robinson's conviction. Now Clem has escaped from prison, and Josh is hired for protection by Mrs. Lawton because her lawyer husband is a coward.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Stubborn Grandpa Fogarty is Lucas's main roadblock as he tries to get young Woody Fogarty to attend school.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas and Mark meet Mark Twain and find out that he hides a sad secret.

programme.title: The Three Stooges
programme.sub-title: Mummy's Dummies, Who Done It, Loose Loot, Heavenly Daze, Cuckoo On A Choo Choo, Goof On The Roof
programme.desc: "Set in ancient Egypt, the Stooges run a used chariot lot where they unload defective chariots on unsuspecting customers. When they gyp the head of the palace guard, they're brought to the palace to be executed, but instead become royal chamberlains after curing the King's toothache. When they recover some tax money stolen by a corrupt official, the King rewards them with marriage to his daughter. After getting a look at the ugly crone, Moe and Larry select Shemp to be the groom. , The Stooges are private detectives looking for a missing millionaire. They wander around the millionaire's spooky mansion confronting various crooks and a dangerous dame. The Stooges vanquish the crooks (Shemp uses his "trusty shovel") and find the missing man. , The Stooges are willed a lot of dough from a rich uncle, but the executor of the estate, Icabob Slipp, is a crook who absconds with the money. The Stooges trail him to a theater where they engage in a wild chase and ultimately recover their inheritance. [ the opening scenes are taken from "Hold that Lion". ] , A divine comedy classic! Shemp goes to Heaven but isn't allowed through the Pearly Gates until he can reform bad boys Larry and Moe. , Larry and Shemp are living in a stolen railroad car. Larry wants to marry his girlfriend, but she won't consent until Shemp marries her sister. Shemp however, is constantly drunk and in love with "Carry", an imaginary giant canary. Moe is an investigator from the railroad, sent to discover how the car was stolen from a moving train. Moe is also in love with Shemp's girl. Shemp winds up with both women, but still prefers his imaginary canary. , The Stooges are entrusted with taking care of their friend's house while he goes off to get married. At first they only wreck the place a little bit, but when they try to install a television antenna, total destruction ensues. When their friend returns with his bride, she's so shocked she walks out on him. "

programme.title: Svengoolie
programme.desc:
"A spaceship from another world crashes in the Arizona desert, and only an amateur stargazer and a schoolteacher suspect alien influence when the local townsfolk begin to act strange.
"

programme.title: Batman
programme.desc: Using her Voice-Eraser, Catwoman plans to steal the voices of British rock singers staying at the Wayne Manor.

programme.title: Batman
programme.desc: Catwoman, having used her Voice-Eraser, holds British rock singers' voices for ransom.

programme.title: Star Trek
programme.desc: Kirk and the Enterprise must combat parasitic aliens.

programme.title: Kolchak: The Night Stalker
programme.desc: In snowy Chicago the INS Christmas party is to send off Tony Vincenzo, but he gets audited instead, and it is Carl who gets to go on the singles cruise, where a werewolf goes on a killing spree.

programme.title: Lost in Space
programme.desc: On their next planetary stop, the Robinsons encounter a hermit who plans to attack the Jupiter 2 with his army.

programme.title: Voyage to the Bottom of the Sea
programme.desc: A mad art collector hijacks the Seaview in a dramatic plan to pirate Leonardo de Vinci's Mona Lisa from a French ship.

programme.title: Land of the Giants
programme.desc: The Earthlings find an abandoned time machine, but when Fitzhugh accidentally activates it, he and Steve end up on Earth... in the 1900s.

programme.title: The Time Tunnel
programme.desc: In Paris during the French Revolution, the time travelers agree to aid Marie Antoinette in exchange for safe-conduct passes.

programme.title: The Invaders
programme.desc: The president of an electronics company fears aliens are kidnapping prominent minds -- and he's next!

programme.title: Thunderbirds
programme.desc: "The Army's new Sidewinder falls down a burning pit. Can International Rescue haul the machine out of the pit before it breaks up?"

programme.title: Saved by the Bell
programme.desc: Miss Bliss's former teacher, substituting for her, stirs controversy with his unorthodox teaching methods. Meanwhile, Nikki is the star pitcher on the softball team, but has second thoughts when Lisa tells her to get in touch with her "domestic side."

programme.title: Saved by the Bell
programme.desc: Zack sets up a 900-number hotline in his latest moneymaking scheme, with Lisa offering advice to the students of Bayside. Things go awry, however, when Zack takes over and offers terrible advice.

programme.title: Saved by the Bell
programme.desc: Jealous of Slater's skills in Driver's Education, Zack sabotages his driving test.

programme.title: Saved by the Bell
programme.desc: Zach hires an actor to play his dad when he learns he's failing.

programme.title: Saved by the Bell
programme.desc: Zack bets Slater that the winner of the Miss Bayside Beauty Pageant will be Screech.

programme.title: Saved by the Bell
programme.desc: After being forced to join the Army Cadet Corps, Zack persuade the gang to join, too.

programme.title: The Flintstones
programme.desc: Barney is told he is a long lost Prince and must take his place on the throne--alongside his new harem!

programme.title: The Flintstones
programme.desc: Problems arise when Gazoo creates twins of Fred and Barney.

programme.title: The Flintstones
programme.sub-title: How To Pick A Fight With Your Wife Without Really Trying
programme.desc: Fred and Barney feel their wives nag them too much and decide to live on their own.

programme.title: The Jetsons
programme.desc: Mr. Spacely pays for a new, expensive robot to take George's promotion as office supervisor, who double crosses him at every turn.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Andy and Barney are working late at the courthouse when they get a visit from two wild women. Out of pure kindness, they drive the "fun girls" home, but don't know that Helen and Thelma Lou saw them with the women.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Barney acquires some fortune-telling cards and a secret box. The cards promise magical occurrences, and when his wish is granted, he becomes convinced that the box has mystical powers.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Barney gives Gomer a ticket for making an illegal U-turn, but then when Barney does it, Gomer has no choice but to make a citizen's arrest.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Andy tries to make a silk purse out of a sow's ear when he takes it upon himself to turn Ernest T. into a presentable gentleman. The big test comes at Mrs. Wiley's weekly reception, at which Andy passes him off as his cousin.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Andy becomes upset when Opie contributes a measly three cents to the Underprivileged Children's drive.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Barney tries to convince everyone of a lack of security at Mayberry Bank, and is furious that no one listens to him. Taking matters into his own hands, he ends up stuck in the bank vault.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Andy and Barney visit the Darlings to rid them of Ernest T. Bass, who has his mind set on marrying daughter Charlene.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Opie accidentally kills a mother bird with his new slingshot and takes it upon himself to raise the orphaned baby birds. After adopting them, Opie faces the difficult task of setting them free.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Barney and Floyd run out of gas while coming home from a fishing trip. While looking for a telephone they are captured by three female escaped convicts.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: It's canning time again, and Aunt Bee has put up another batch of pickles. After realizing the only thing they're good for is killing flies brave enough to land on them, Andy and Barney decide to substitute store-bought for her homemade.

programme.title: Full House
programme.desc: Michelle's birthday party is interrupted when Rebecca starts to experience labor pains and is rushed to the hospital.

programme.title: Full House
programme.desc: Michelle's birthday party has just begun when Becky begins labor. Becky gives birth to twin boys, Alexander and Nicholas.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Andy and the new mayor are not on the same page in terms of Andy's style of managing Mayberry's sheriff's department.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Andy and Opie are left alone while Aunt Bee goes out of town. Peggy, Andy's new girlfriend, takes great delight in helping the boys handle things. Floyd warns Andy that Peggy is using her feminine wiles to "snare" him.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: "Newscaster Clete Roberts, reprising an earlier interview appearance, returns to update Korean War conditions, when he conducts a series of television talks with the leading characters of the 4077th. "

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: Newscaster Clete Roberts, reprising an earlier interview appearance, returns to update Korean War conditions, when he conducts a series of television talks with the leading characters of the 4077th.

programme.title: Perry Mason: The Case of the Glass Coffin
programme.sub-title: Perry Mason: The Case Of The Glass Coffin
programme.desc: Assistant Kate Ford tells world-famous magician David Katz that she's pregnant with his child on the date he's supposed to put on a benefit show for charity. At the show a trick goes wrong and nasty Katie assumes room temperature. The magician is blamed and ends up on trial.

programme.title: Carol Burnett and Friends
programme.desc: In Exercise with Jack Leilani, Carol tries her best to exercise, despite her large size. Then, in The Carpenters, Harvey and Lyle complain about women in the workforce, obliviously to Carol finishing the construction project behind them. Finally, in Bachelor Party, Steve uses his charm one last time to woo Carol, not knowing she's his fiance's sister.

programme.title: Carol Burnett and Friends
programme.desc: In Mrs. Wiggins, Carol plays a flighty secretary who can't use a door buzzer correctly. Then, in Medical Documentary, a starry-eyed doctor uses his patient to get famous. Finally, in The Lift, Carol reunites with an old flame in a series of one-word exchanges.

programme.title: The Dick Van Dyke Show
programme.desc: Buddy's stay at the Petries causes endless problems.

programme.title: The Dick Van Dyke Show
programme.desc: Richie isn't happy when Rob is awarded "Father of the Week".

programme.title: The Honeymooners
programme.desc: The Kramdens and the Nortons fight a rent increase, though Ralph is the only one who really wants to fight.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A has-been, drunk gunslinger finds his fast-draw abilities magically restored.

programme.title: The Alfred Hitchcock Hour

programme.desc: Expert gambler Duke Marsden finds his very existence at risk when he wins $30,000 from an inhuman ex-hood.

programme.title: The Fugitive
programme.desc: Herbie Grant, a second rate hoodlum, is shot in the leg while trying to rob a liquor store that Kimble works at. Herbie later takes Kimble hostage where Herbie claims that although he tried to rob the store, he is innocent of two other liquor store robber

programme.title: Mission: Impossible
programme.desc: Reese Dolan is the new Syndicate heroin distributor on the East Coast. Dolan uses an island base off the coast of northwest Africa and is going to use it as a distribution point for heroin into the U.S. The IMF must identify his overseas opium source and put an end to Dolan's operation.

programme.title: Peter Gunn
programme.desc: Someone is out to kill a former underworld boss, Joe Webber, who is back home after serving a lengthy prison term. Out of touch with the underworld, Webber hires Peter Gunn to find the identity of his would-be killer.

programme.title: Peter Gunn
programme.desc: Arthur Cole accuses his boss of killing his wife and hires Gunn to prove it. Before long, however, Cole becomes a suspect himself.

programme.title: Highway Patrol
programme.desc: An escapee from a mental hospital is the primary suspect in the violent death of a farmer.

programme.title: Dragnet
programme.desc: Sgt. Friday is offered a bribe to assist a gypsy family trying to gain control of the gypsy community.

programme.title: Dragnet
programme.desc: When a nine-month old child is beaten, Friday and Gannon investigate the parents, who are more concerned about their failing relationship than their baby son.

programme.title: My Three Sons
programme.desc: With the triplets now at home, both Robbie and Steve make plans for accommodating the growing Douglas family.

programme.title: Toon In With Me
programme.desc: "Bill and Toony watch six cartoons set in various historical time periods, including classics such as "Roman Legion-Hare" and "It’s Greek to Me-Ow.""

programme.title: Leave It to Beaver
programme.desc: Beaver becomes convinced that he's ugly and unwanted after constantly being reminded how cute he used to be and from being yelled at by his parents for how messy he is currently.

programme.title: Leave It to Beaver
programme.desc: Wally is rounding up some guys to go to an amusement park and he's one short from getting a discount so he settles on Beaver. However, Beaver begins having second thoughts when he hears stories about one of the roller coasters.

programme.title: Perry Mason
programme.sub-title: The Case Of The Petulant Partner
programme.desc: Harry Bright and Chuck Clark were once best friends and business partners until Margaret entered the picture. Margaret was a much younger woman on the make who entranced Chuck into marrying her. When Margaret is found shot to death, Harry is arrested for murder.

programme.title: Matlock
programme.desc: When Sam Chandler is found murdered, his lawyer, David O'Malley, is the prime suspect—in part because Sam was sleeping with David's wife.

programme.title: In the Heat of the Night
programme.desc: After Bubba's cousin adopts a baby her husband is blackmailed by the child's real parents - they want him to help them steal the payroll where he works.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: When Miss Hunter is called away unexpectedly, a substitute teacher with ways of her own takes over

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: Matt faces fear and hostility in Ridge Town where he investigates an old murder case.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: A man is reunited with his wife after she was abducted years earlier by the Paiutes Indians—discovering that she now has a half-Indian baby.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas tries to stop embittered John Holliver from venting his wrath on the people who expelled him from town years before.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas becomes the target of a vengeful mountaineer.

programme.title: Wagon Train
programme.desc: "Kurt Davos, a highly respected man, is badly injured while trying to save Florence Hastings trapped in a runaway wagon. Florence, scared of dogs had once tried to kill Kurt's dog, volunteers to live with and care for Kurt, now paralyzed."

programme.title: Adam-12
programme.sub-title: Log 22: So This Little Guy Goes Into This Bar, And...
programme.desc: "A fur burglary, a family fight and a loud party."

programme.title: Adam-12
programme.desc: On their day off, Malloy and Reed agree to give a talk to a group of fifth grade students, and then offer to let the kids watch them train for the California Police Olympics. But when the tires of their patrol car are slashed and a stopwatch goes missing out of reed's car, the two officers start to suspect one of the children.

programme.title: The A-Team
programme.desc: "The A-Team is convicted of murdering Col. Morrison."

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: Frank Burns complains about Hawkeye Pierce's disrespect, and when Henry appoints Hawkeye chief surgeon, it's to Burns' shock. The rest of the 4077th "coronates" Hawk while Frank and Hot Lips complain to General Barker.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: Majors Houlihan and Burns press charges against Colonel Blake to get him arrested and put Frank in charge. They also put Hawkeye and Trapper under arrest so that they can't help Henry.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: The mayor calls in an investigator from the state capital to help solve a string of cow thefts.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Andy shows up for a date with Peggy McMillan only to learn her old friend, Don, has arrived unexpectedly, leading to a string of misunderstandings and Barney's attempts at help.

programme.title: Gomer Pyle, U.S.M.C.
programme.desc: Sgt. Carter decides he must get away from Gomer to avoid a nervous breakdown, but it's far easier said than done.

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.sub-title: Don't Call Us, We'll Call You
programme.desc: With their phone still not connected, Oliver asks Mr. Kimball to put some pressure on his mother, who owns the telephone company. Kimball says he and his mother aren't speaking, but Oliver convinces him to make up with her. His mom is so grateful, she promptly has a phone installed--on top of a pole outside their bedroom.

programme.title: Hogan's Heroes
programme.desc: Hogan gets Klink to open an antiques business selling "rare" cuckoo clocks, a business venture that is actually a ruse enabling the POWs to smuggle information out in the timepieces.

programme.title: Hogan's Heroes
programme.sub-title: Is There A Traitor In The House?
programme.desc: Hogan plans to send information to London by using a German radio propaganda program.

programme.title: Carol Burnett and Friends
programme.desc: In Whiplash, Harvey fakes an injury to scam an unsuspecting Carol. Then, in The Family, Eunice and Mama are mad after they attend the anniversary of her husband's co-worker.

programme.title: Perry Mason
programme.sub-title: The Case Of The Wrongful Writ
programme.desc: After a young lawyer is framed for the murder of a man claiming to be a government agent, Mason must cull through witnesses to identify the killer.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: An aging former movie star lives and dreams in the past, constantly watching her old movies alone in isolation.

programme.title: Alfred Hitchcock Presents
programme.desc: After falling in love with his invalid wife's nurse, a man schemes to get rid of his wife altogether.

programme.title: Alfred Hitchcock Presents
programme.desc: A museum piece causes problems for a curious visitor.

programme.title: Mannix
programme.desc: Mannix is brought into the case of the kidnapping of a tycoon's wife.

programme.title: Cannon
programme.desc: A young girl turns up dead at the yacht party thrown by two jet set brothers, Edgar and Norman Bruce. Her father, George Able, wants to exact revenge, but before he can even get close to the siblings he is beaten up by his henchmen. Cannon is hired by Abel's second daughter.

programme.title: Barnaby Jones
programme.desc: Barnaby probes the death of a girl who was a supposedly skilled surfer.

programme.title: Highway Patrol
programme.desc: Dan Matthews pursues a recidivist thief with a tip from a young boy.

programme.title: Dragnet
programme.desc: An ex-con accused of extortion is interrogated. He calmly and smugly insists that he is innocent, but Friday and Gannon have a surprise for him: taped conversations and a voice analysis device.

programme.title: Dragnet
programme.desc: Friday and Gannon learn that a young man has called his mother from Hollywood "to say goodbye." With the help of the man's sister, the two detectives trace the impending suicide to a hotel with more than 1,200 rooms.

programme.title: My Three Sons
programme.desc: Robbie and Katie are reluctant to leave their babies with an unknown sitter while they attend a high school reunion.

programme.title: Toon In With Me
programme.desc: "Toony gets a movie deal but needs help from Bill and an voice coach to seal the deal. Cartoons feature Sylvester, The Pink Panther, and the Toon In With Me premiere of a Bugs Bunny cartoon!"

programme.title: Leave It to Beaver
programme.desc: Beaver, Gilbert and Richard find a burro for sale in Mayfield and they each decide to go in $10 for it. After getting their parent's permission, Richard and Gilbert fight over who gets to keep the burro, which they name Pepe. However, once they get a load of just how destructive a burro can be, they dump the problem of room and board on Beaver.

programme.title: Leave It to Beaver
programme.desc: Eddie pompously announces that he's dropping out of school to get a high paying job at a gas station. However, all is not as it seems when Wally and Lumpy get a glance at Eddie's new free spending life.

programme.title: Perry Mason
programme.sub-title: The Case Of The Dangerous Dowager
programme.desc: Matilda Benson is a tough old broad who rules her children with an iron hand and the promises in her will. When Benson and her brood become involved in a gambling scandal and the death of a nightclub owner, Mason looks into the matriarch's matter.

programme.title: Matlock
programme.desc: When Sam Chandler is found murdered, his lawyer, David O'Malley, is the prime suspect—in part because Sam was sleeping with David's wife.

programme.title: In the Heat of the Night
programme.desc: A flirtatious schoolteacher is stalked by a madman.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: The promise of inherited money is behind some happy moments and unusual conflicts for the Walton Family.

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: Newcomer Ben Stack makes a play for saloon girl Honey Dare.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Georgio Rossi is at a loss as to why he is not allowed to have Indians living on his land.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Mark finds himself the unwilling companion of gunman Carl Avery.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas looks for escape after he's captured by outlaws while seeking help for an injured Mark.

programme.title: Wagon Train
programme.desc: "Patrick O'Shaughnessy has come to visit his daughter Eve, believing her to be a respectable married woman. Knowing that Eve actually is the popular owner of a saloon, Hawks, Wooster, Duke, and Eve's favorite patrons decide to change Eve."

programme.title: Adam-12
programme.desc: Malloy and Reed are on the lookout for the "Mulholland Mauler," who has raped six female hitchhikers and left them for dead. They quickly make an arrest of a likely suspect and take him to the location of an abandoned vehicle, after learning its owner never made it to her destination.

programme.title: Adam-12
programme.sub-title: Log 52 -- Good Cop: Handle With Care
programme.desc: Malloy and Reed see a man passed out in an alley and stop to lend assistance, deliver bad news to a young wife, apprehend a mentally ill man who then becomes uncontrollably violent in their patrol car, and respond to a robbery that needlessly becomes a tragedy. All along the way the officers have their every move second guessed by a pair of young, unethical freelance journalists who are determined to document police brutality.

programme.title: The A-Team
programme.desc: "Murdock escapes from the veterans hospital to save Face, B.A. and Hannibal from execution."

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: The supply lines to the camp are cut. Radar, the housing officer, starts doubling people up to save fuel and Klinger is thrown out of the nurse's tent. People start burning everything to stay warm while Frank wears his heated socks. The toilet paper supply is worst hit, and then wounded start arriving.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: When spring arrives, Klinger gets word from home that his sweetheart back in Toledo wants to marry him. Henry arranges for Father Mulcahy to do this over short wave radio. Radar falls in love with a nurse, while a grateful patient won't leave Hawkeye alone, and even threatens Major Burns.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Barney's ability to be a lawman is put to the test with some peddlers and he fails. His confidence is shattered until Andy steps in behind the scenes and warns the peddlers of "Fife the Fierce."

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Mayor Stoner declares the town's marching band a disgrace and refuses to allocate money for its annual trip to the state competition. Andy takes matters into his own hands, with help from Bobby Fleet and his Band with a Beat.

programme.title: Gomer Pyle, U.S.M.C.
programme.desc: Gomer plans to go home to Mayberry to help Goober out with the purchase of a gas station. Sgt. Carter rides the bus with Gomer to make sure he gets there safely.

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: Oliver wants to plant wheat on all 160 of his acres, but the local agricultural committee says he can only do eight. Incensed, Oliver takes his complaints all the way to Washington. Surprisingly, Haney sides with Oliver and prepares to fight the National Guard in "The Siege of Green Acres".

programme.title: Hogan's Heroes
programme.desc: After Hogan mines a bridge, he learns that a truck of Allied prisoners would be the first to cross it and a new plan is born which includes a flaming arrow from Sioux Indian Carter, aka Little Deer Who Goes Swift And Sure Through Forest.

programme.title: Hogan's Heroes
programme.sub-title: Clearance Sale At The Black Market
programme.desc: After seeing something he shouldn't have, Schultz is ordered to the Russian front.

programme.title: Carol Burnett and Friends
programme.desc: In Mildred Fierce, Carol and the gang parody the classic "Mildred Pierce", with Carol playing Joan.

programme.title: Perry Mason
programme.sub-title: The Case Of The Mischievous Doll
programme.desc: When a shady private investigator and his pawn die mysteriously, the woman who may have been his intended target is charged with their murders.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: When a man decides to visit his hometown, he finds it exactly as it was when he was a child.

programme.title: Alfred Hitchcock Presents
programme.desc: A woman begins to realize that her mother has no intentions of cutting her from her apron strings.

programme.title: Alfred Hitchcock Presents
programme.desc: An older woman tries to convince her young lover to end her husband's life.

programme.title: Mannix
programme.desc: Mannix investigates the mysterious death of an Air Force pilot who died right before the presentation of an experimental aircraft.

programme.title: Cannon
programme.desc: Tim Jardine was persuaded by his friends Amy and Claude to blackmail his father for 50,000 dollars. Nevertheless, Jardine's father is facing bankruptcy and Claude loses his patience and becomes a criminal.

programme.title: Barnaby Jones
programme.desc: The residents of a small town being terrorized by a rapist falsely accuse a stutterer.

programme.title: Highway Patrol
programme.desc: A hitchhiker implicates a man who gave him a ride.

programme.title: Dragnet
programme.desc: Petty theft from drug and hardware stores leads to a group of four teens who are determined to start their own nation on a remote island off the California coast.

programme.title: Dragnet
programme.desc: Friday and Gannon are screening applicants for the Police Academy. One seems to have all the right qualifications, except that six months are missing from his application.

programme.title: My Three Sons
programme.desc: After Uncle Charley's girlfriend suddenly leaves him for a younger man, Katie schemes to put the wind back into his sails.

programme.title: Toon In With Me
programme.desc: "Bill and Toony celebrate their favorite September 14 holidays, with a little help from their friends. Classic cartoons feature Bugs Bunny, Daffy Duck, and Foghorn Leghorn."

programme.title: Leave It to Beaver
programme.desc: A communication gap ensues when Wally wants to spend the night at Lumpy's and Beaver wants to have Gilbert spend the night. Beaver asks June and she tells him he can sometime when Wally spends the night somewhere and Wally asks Ward, who tells him he can sometime when Beaver has someone spend the night.

programme.title: Leave It to Beaver
programme.desc: Beaver agrees to help Richard cart his family's clothes down to the laundromat; however, half way there they discover that Richard has lost the three dollars his mother gave him. This leads him to ask Beaver if he could use the Cleaver washer. They soon find themselves in another jam when the washing machine overflows after Beaver put in too much soap and starch.

programme.title: Perry Mason
programme.sub-title: The Case Of The Deadly Toy
programme.desc: Martin Selkirk is a major league rotter who wants Claire Allison in the worst way, even though she's dating Dirk Benedict. Selkirk has Dirk's jaw broken and begins sending Claire threatening mail. Then Selkirk is murdered in his beach house.

programme.title: Matlock
programme.desc: Julie becomes the target of a witness with psychological problems, leaving Matlock and Conrad to learn who is threatening her, and why.

programme.title: In the Heat of the Night
programme.desc: A game of high stakes poker ends in murder.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Engine trouble on the air mail transport plane means the Waltons have a guest for a few days.

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: A cowboy admires a buffalo hunter too much to admit that the man also is a thief.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Joe and Candy haven't a clue of what to do with a stamping mill they won in a poker game.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: The Queen-to-be of France hides out in North Fork.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Micah has an infamous outlaw, Charlie Gordo, in his jail waiting for the U.S. marshal from Denver to take Gordo to the Yuma prison for hanging. With the arrival of the stage, Micah finds that the lawman has been killed, and he has to look to his friends to defend the jail from Gordo's gang.

programme.title: Wagon Train
programme.desc: "A Bible-quoting marshal joins the wagon train with his prisoner, a young bank robber whom he claims to be trying to reform. He wants the prisoner to atone for his sins by telling the location of the money he hid from his last holdup."

programme.title: Adam-12
programme.sub-title: Log 23: Pig Is A Three Letter Word
programme.desc: "The officers are subjected to verbal abuse when they arrest armed robbers."

programme.title: Adam-12
programme.desc: An older husband complains about his wife and friend's noisy karate practice. A hit and run traffic accident looks looks like a homicide. The officers use their investigative skills to locate the suspect and arrest him.

programme.title: The A-Team
programme.desc: "The A-Team arranges an exhibition football game to free a famous biochemist in East Berlin. Guest star: Joe Namath."

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: The camp prepares for a visit from General MacArthur. Klinger dresses as the Statue of Liberty as the General's jeep drives through the camp. MacArthur is so impressed, he salutes!

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: Henry finally gets his discharge. While he is tying things up, Burns prepares for his new command. Henry bids a tearful adieu, but not before Klinger turns up in an outrageous tropical outfit.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Madeline Grayson, a rich widow that Floyd has been "pen-palling" with, announces in her next letter that she wants to meet him face-to-face. Of course, the whole time Floyd has been pretending in his letters to be a wealthy entrepreneur.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Opie is afraid that Andy's new girlfriend, Peggy, will take his place in his father's heart, and sets out to sabotage their relationship.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: When Andy learns that Barney hasn't been very successful in Raleigh, he helps Barney solve a series of supermarket robberies so he can keep his job.

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: Fearful that Mr. Haney will lay claim to Eleanor's calf, the Douglases decide to keep the cow's pregnancy a secret. The Hooterville gossips get part of the story right, except they think it's Lisa who's expecting.

programme.title: Hogan's Heroes
programme.desc: Hogan convinces Klink to get back in shape so he won't be sent to the Russian front.

programme.title: Hogan's Heroes
programme.desc: Hogan plans to get a trainload of stolen paintings back to London, but things get complicated when Marya uses Schultz to impersonate Reich Marshall Goehring.

programme.title: Carol Burnett and Friends
programme.sub-title: Mother Of The Bride / Stradivarius / Perfect Crime, The
programme.desc: In Mother of the Bride, Carol gives daughter Vicki last minute marriage advice. Then, in Stradivarius, Harvey desperately seeks a repairman for his violin. Finally, in The Perfect Crime, Carol is married to a billionaire who is the most boring man alive.

programme.title: Perry Mason
programme.sub-title: The Case Of The Laughing Lady
programme.desc: A woman being held in prison pending her trial sees the woman whom she believes committed the crime with which she has been charged on a televised gala.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A hypochondriac exchanges his soul for immortality and indestructibility.

programme.title: Alfred Hitchcock Presents
programme.desc: When the syndicate turns against the owner of a casino, he fears for his life.

programme.title: Alfred Hitchcock Presents
programme.desc: A young man convinces his girlfriend to accept the marriage proposal from an old, sick and very rich man.

programme.title: Mannix
programme.desc: Traveling to New Orleans, Mannix goes undercover in the Big Easy to protect an informer and avenge the death of a pal.

programme.title: Cannon
programme.desc: Publisher Quigley asks Cannon for help. He believes that hotel proprietor Rawdon has killed six girls. When the seventh victim is found, however, it's Quigley himself who becomes the prime suspect. A lab assistant manipulates the samples used in the framework of the murders.

programme.title: Barnaby Jones
programme.desc: Barney poses as the brother of an eccentric millionaire he's hired to protect.

programme.title: Highway Patrol
programme.desc: A gunman and his female hostage unwittingly wander into a designated blasting area.
